references.paper_title: Community detection and stochastic block models
references.reason: This paper provides a comprehensive overview of community detection and stochastic block models, which are central to the paper's theoretical analysis and experimental results.

references.paper_title: Transfer learning for nonparametric regression: Non-asymptotic minimax analysis and adaptive procedure
references.reason: This paper is highly relevant because it provides non-asymptotic minimax rates for nonparametric transfer learning, which are directly compared to the results of the current work on network transfer learning.
This paper establishes rate-optimal results for graphon estimation, providing a benchmark against which the current work's performance can be compared.

references.paper_title: Consistent nonparametric methods for network assisted covariate estimation
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel graph distance metric used in the algorithm of the current work, demonstrating the significance of its contribution.

references.paper_title: Rates of convergence of spectral methods for graphon estimation
references.reason: This paper provides theoretical upper bounds for graphon estimation, providing a benchmark against which the current work's performance can be compared, and it directly informs the analysis of the oracle algorithm.
